author: NASS
description:
I have colorized, restored, and created a full sound design for this rare archival footage of Ohio, Youngstown, and Cleveland during the Great Depression. The video vividly revives the atmosphere of the late 1930s, showcasing bustling city streets, busy industrial districts, and the iconic downtown skylines. , offering a unique window into everyday life during one of the most pivotal eras in American history.


Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source: National Archives and Records Administration

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

title: 1930s - Youngstown & Cleveland in Color [60fps, Remastered] w/Sound Design
